nodes.text: Erk Zallis was a male Ugnaught engineer. He was hired by the Galactic Republic to work at the carbon freezing chamber of the Jedi Temple during the Clone Wars. Around 21 BBY, Zallis operated the carbon freezing device and froze several Jedi and clone troopers. The Republic elite team needed to avoid life form scan by being frozen to infiltrate the Separatist prison known as the Citadel on the planet Lola Sayu.

Erk Zallis' first and only appearance thus far was in "The Citadel," an episode in the third season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. The episode, which aired on February 14, 2011, did not mention his name; however, a Clone Card on StarWars.com named the Ugnaught Erk Zallis.
